message: Let's split it down the middle.  It's the fairest way to go!
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to give you a little more than before.  Let's end this now.
You're going in the wrong direction, let's try again
This is my final offer.  If we don't agree, we both lose money.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance
This is my final, final offer.  We're running out of time!
Your 'final' offers are getting less credible
This is my absolute final offer. We're losing so much money with each round!
I'm not budging much, you're running out of time
This is my final, final, final offer! It's all or nothing now!
